Name: [Shock] Lightning Rod
Desc: Dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color> triggers <color=#2EB6FF>Jolt</color>, inflicting <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color> equal to 1,200% of ATK. This effect can trigger once every 8s.
Desc2: This Resonium may seem inconspicuous most of the time, but when thunderstorms roll around, it becomes the master of the sky.
